caption.title: Overview of the study area in SSA (top right panel) and the DHS and AIS sample locations (blue dots) for the 7 countries included in this study: Kenya ( n = 394), Malawi ( n = 847) 1, Mozambique ( n = 270), Tanzania ( n = 570) 1, Uganda ( n = 470) 1, Zambia ( n = 719), and Zimbabwe ( n = 400).
